holidays.title: Hogmanay
holidays.description: Hogmanay is a Scottish word meaning "the last day of the year."

holidays.title: International Solidarity Day of Azerbaijanis
holidays.description: We’re joining Azerbaijanis all over the world in saluting their beautiful country.

holidays.title: Make Up Your Mind Day
holidays.description: It's Make Up Your Mind Day; make some destiny-determining decisions.

holidays.title: National Champagne Day
holidays.description: National Champagne Day, is all about enjoying sipping on this bubbly beverage.

holidays.title: National Heroes Day (Timor-Leste)
holidays.description: Learn about the man whom the East Timorese view as the luminary of their independence movement.

holidays.title: No Interruptions Day
holidays.description: In observance of No Interruptions Day, put your phone on 'Do Not Disturb' throughout the workday.

holidays.title: Restoration Day in Geneva
holidays.description: Get ready to fly your inner political geek flag proudly this Restoration Day.

holidays.title: Unlucky Day
holidays.description: Unload all the bad from this year and get ready for the upcoming one.

holidays.title: World Peace Meditation Day
holidays.description: Join us in promoting peace on a global scale while celebrating our differences and diversity.

holidays.title: Amber Katelyn Beale’s Birthday
holidays.description: This YouTube sensation can rock any makeup look! We can’t wait to see her next endeavor.

holidays.title: Anthony Hopkins’s Birthday
holidays.description: Actor, musician, and philanthropist, Hopkins has paved the way for many aspiring celebrities!

holidays.title: Bailey McKnight’s Birthday
holidays.description: She started at a young age, and today she dominates all social media platforms!

holidays.title: Donald Trump Jr.’s Birthday
holidays.description: He's a visionary businessman, political activist, author, and former television presenter.

holidays.title: Donna Summer’s Birthday
holidays.description: Donna Summer was an amazing artist and, to this day, still has a legion of fans!

holidays.title: Gabby Douglas’s Birthday
holidays.description: With her extraordinary skills and talent, Gabby Douglas flew higher than anyone before her!

holidays.title: Harvey Mills’s Birthday
holidays.description: Harvey Mills is a brilliant artist who grows stronger every day, and he’s skyrocketing!

holidays.title: Henri Matisse’s Birthday
holidays.description: Matisse became known as one of the Fauves because of the vibrant colorism of his paintings.

holidays.title: Hunter Schafer’s Birthday
holidays.description: She appeared in the mainstream media not long ago and is already a huge success!

holidays.title: Joey McIntyre’s Birthday
holidays.description: As an actor and musician, Joey McIntyre has been an integral part of the entertainment industry!

holidays.title: John Denver’s Birthday
holidays.description: John Denver lived life to the fullest and created great music that is well-loved today!

holidays.title: Nadia Parkes’s Birthday
holidays.description: This beautiful actress is going to take over the world of the entertainment industry.

holidays.title: Natalia Pitti’s Birthday
holidays.description: Natalia Pitti is a brilliant artist who grows stronger every day — the world is hers!

holidays.title: Psy’s Birthday
holidays.description: It only took one song — ‘Gangnam Style’ shot this singer cum songwriter to international fame!

holidays.title: Val Kilmer’s Birthday
holidays.description: Val Kilmer has had a long and prosperous career — we're celebrating the phenomenal actor today!
